description.diamond-pearl:
The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.
description.platinum:
The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.
description.black-white:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

description.sword-shield:
The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The
user may use any remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
